clientId: Client ID from OAuth2 Client Details, e.g. 424f0011-6789-48c5-mn79-12345ea239e0
clientSecret: Client Secret from OAuth2 Client Details, e.g. Q-W9Dtm~hCcPS5GJtWC_0AbCde
clientScopeThings: Client Scope from OAuth2 Client Details, e.g. service:iot-things-eu-1:df123456-53d8-4bf1-ba09-6789b6f11aba_things/full-access
